skills.name: SHARDLIGHT
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to Steal All Beneficial Effects, including Golden Effects.
• Damage dealt increased based on your DEF stat.

skills.name: BORN FROM HATE
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.
• Grant Ascension to all allies for 1 turn.
• Damage dealt increased based on your DEF stats.

skills.name: MORTEM ET TU
desc: Gain an Extra Turn when you kill an enemy. 50% Chance to Revenge an enemy when an ally is attacked.
